text: This pizza blew my mind!!!!! Was expecting your average chain pizza, but as you can see, we couldn't keep our hands off of it ;) Quick delivery, polite driver, and overall wonderful customer service~ Note: this location is noticeably better ‚Ä¶More

text: Would love to say this is good, however, this time was just awful. Ordered online, cool, done that before. 45 minutes for delivery, that's expected. An hour after the order, no pizza and no call from the store. Ok, they're busy, benefit of ‚Ä¶More

text: Went in there expecting my food to be ready and they said 10 minutes and 20 minutes later my food is there, but it wasn't cooked all the way. Just doughy and undercooked, with a teaspoon of sauce on an extra large pizza which barely gave it ‚Ä¶More

name: Carolyn DePottey
text: Good prices and good pizza!  Nice choice of flavored crusts so you can change things up.  Always good service and fast to get my order ready.

name: Tiara Miles
text: Literally the best location out of all the ones I‚Äôve been to. Food is always hot and fresh! Love the rewards program also!

name: Alison Nedvidek
text: I ordered cinnamon Howie bread with my order online. It was so greasy, the bread and the box was sopping. Didn't taste any sugar either, just cinnamon, and barely that because of the grease. They didn't even offer to make it right. I accidentally ordered from here instead of the closest store.. I won't order from Clawson again.

name: Gwen Davis
text: The pizza and bread here is DELICIOUS! My service was quick, and super friendly! I even went in on Halloween and some of the workers were wearing costumes!! There was an especially cute cowboy, and super nice turtle ninja. (:  Love it! Great spirt, service, and food.

name: J
text: They‚Äôre always super quick and nice.

name: Johnny Delly
text: Very very good food and nice crust choices

name: Hunter Trifoni
text: This used to be my to go to pizza place when I used to live in the area, ordered online because it was on my way few days ago.. asked for well done, light sauce, none of this was done. Also it had extra extra cheese which didn't ask for. Not sure what happened with this store.

name: mark
text: Last 3 orders have been a mess.  Ordering through the app they didn't put the extra bacon on my pizza at all.  I called and they said my account would be credited on the next order, it wasn't.  When I placed my next order they said there ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Smith
text: I have not had a negative experience to date at this location.  Highly recommend!

name: Anjanette Lamothe
text: Its a fast place. Not all put together alot of times. Just another pizza joint

name: Aaron Muccino
text: I miss the way it was 10+years ago. It pretty much sucks now. It has nothing to do with the local staff either. It's the ingredients and corporate decision-makers that try to check all the boxes at the board meetings at the expense of the ‚Ä¶More

text: I need everyone to take a second and stop by this fine establishment. This is not your average group of pizza makers. This is the home to pizza artists. Your pizza will come out looking better than it does in the ads. Pizza looks so good it ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Hann
text: The pizza and sub that I've gotten it was good and they was prompt on time when they said it was going to be ready

name: jerry henderson
text: in all my years i have never had a pizza as amazing as this, the cheese is just so cheesy the crust is oh so crusty, everything about the pizza is amazing. don't even get me started on the staff, everyone there is a great person, they ‚Ä¶More

name: Patryk Paletko
text: Hungry Howies remains one of my favorite pizza places. Good tasting food.

name: Janice Witt
text: Great food for the money.

name: Chidinma Nze
text: Great service: The guy brought my pizza out to my car when it was ready! Though small, this gesture was very nice and not one that I think is common.

name: Brady Jacobs
text: Food is good. But they charged for extra icing on cinnamon bread and didn't deliver any icing!

name: Lisa Kendall
text: We love this store! We asked for them to draw a dinosaur on our pizza box under special instructions when we placed our online order, and low and behold they did! They take great care of their customers and our pizza is always hot and delicious~!!!!

name: A Person
text:
I'd give this a zero if I could.

The only plus side about ordering pizza from this place is that it's diet pizza! ‚Ä¶More

name: Katrina Ling
text: Excellent  pizza and service!

name: Ben Dunshee
text: Good pizza, reasonable price.  Haven't had a bad pizza.  That said it's a pretty standard pizza. Nothing to drive miles out of your way for.   As a side note despite what google maps says, they are open open Saturday and Sunday.

name: Konrad Kaminski
text: The asian kid is awesome, great service, makes me walk out with a laughter everytime and satisfaction. Best crust in town. Definitely my go-to Pizza place, and definitely always gonna tip the nice little asian lad.

name: Marilyn Falcon
text: Pizza is great, but you need to order it well done or over baked for the best taste and crust. The only downside is their delivery charge is too high but they are great for carry out.

name: Don Mills
text: Great hungry Howie's. Staff and management here is very good.

name: Ben Holland
text: This pizzaria was outstandingly good, I normally stay away from pizza chains but I'll make an exception just for this one hungry howies.

name: Jerome Criger
text: Hungry Howies makes a great pizza but when I order from this location on the last three occasions the wait was much longer than the estimated time and the pizza was barely warm. ‚Ä¶More

text: The pizza I ordered had very little sauce.  The one they brought to replace it was just as bad. It  looked like it was put on with a small paint brush.

name: Mike Morris
text: Zero can‚Äôt even get a online order right. Ordered bbq boneless wings, there was a drip of bbq sauce on the wings some had none. Went to pick up my order they tried to only give me 1 out of 3 items that I ordered. My cheese bread that I ‚Ä¶More

name: Mars
text: Food was way over-cooked, I asked for light cheese and instead got light sauce. Also to top all that off I got a very severe case of the stomach flu after eating their food, so bad in fact, I had to be brought into the hospital so I wouldnt die of dehydration.

name: Kieran Clark
text: deliveries always on point for time (way less drivers than jets but somehow faster deliveries) local guide dude trippin...

text: I liked there pizzas but i don't know if he still works there but this kids like banned me because i called and said that this pizzas was to greasy and gave me heart burn this once and returned the pizzas very unprofessional

text:

text: Multiple visits to this location have me convinced that they do not know how to read.

name: Anthony Gadbois
text: The options of crust flavors here is spectacular. The pizza and bread combo here is amazing usually pretty quick at making pizzas.

name: Chelsea Merkle
text: I Ordered a pizza online and after an hour I called wanting to know if something was wrong with my order. The women I spoke to told me they are busy and explained she was too busy to call me. I guess they won't be needing my business.
